direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods interact with the Binance API to retrieve information, but for different purposes (trade history vs. exchange info).
Both methods access Binance API endpoints that require signed requests and handle similar types of parameters.
Both methods involve sending signed requests to the Binance API with similar parameter handling and control flows.
Both methods handle exceptions related to API requests and parameter validation in a similar manner.
Both methods depend on the RequestHandler for sending signed requests, sharing the same underlying dependency.
